så gulligt.

comment.author: 86164332@N00
comment._content: It's sweet to see an old couple holding hands!

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: Stort tack till bloggen "Det förflutnas röster" som har gett oss hela namnen på paret Samuelsson, delar av deras livs historia och mer om bygden där de levde: forflutnas.blogspot.com/2011/04/manniskorna-i-bilden.html (A blog by a Swedish historian gave us the full names of the Samuelsson couple, and also parts of their life story in Stigåsa.) /Anna B.
